question_text: How long have you held the account?
What type of device do you use to access your account?
You recently made a (large) transaction of £X, what was the merchant?
In the past 6 months you made a transaction with an Airline, which airline?
How do you make payment into the account?
Do you have any other NewDay accounts?
What are the last four digits of your account number?
Have you used your card abroad in the past 12 months?
What is the name of your secondary cardholder?
You recently raised a dispute with X merchant, what was the item / why dispute?
You have a DD set up on the account, what are the last four digits of the account number?
How old are you?
What is your star sign?
What county do you live in?
What was your previous address?
Have you changed your address in the last 12 months?
Have you ever changed your name on this account?
(London Only) what is your nearest Tube station?
Have you been contacted by someone claiming to be from our bank recently?
Have you been contacted by someone claiming to be a family member and asked to make this transaction?
Have you given remote access to your device to anyone (e.g., via AnyDesk)?
Did anyone ask you to move money for “safety” reasons?
Have you been asked to invest or transfer funds by someone you met online?
